CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "MPW",'Please provide the number of devices to be simultaneously attached to the network. The maximum is 100,000.', IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "LightspanSX",'In addition to the Altiplano Access Controller courses on Installation, Administration, and Operation offered by Nokia EDU, channel partner is expected to have competence in Kubernetes/Helm as well as other IT cloud technologies such as MariaDB, ELK, TSDB, Fluentd, Grafana, WebDAV, Keycloak, Kafka, NGINX, and Prometheus. Basic concepts of SDN/NFV, SDAN , Netconf/Yang and G.fast Configuration and Operation â€“ also offered by Nokia EDU - are also assumed.'&BR()&'If those competences and skills are not fulfilled yet, please contact to Nokia in order to request the corresponding customized Service.',IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "7705SAR18",'Select if you require AC Power. (AC Power converters will be added to the shopping cart.)','This tool will take you through the configuration of the 7750 SR-7 and 12. Please follow the guidance on each tab and select the items which suit your requirements.')))
CustomField.label: Guidance
